com.arjuna.ats.jta.recovery.XAResourceRecoveryHelper

    com.arjuna.ats.internal.jbossatx.jta

    • Uses of XAResourceRecoveryHelper in com.arjuna.ats.internal.jbossatx.jta

      Classes in com.arjuna.ats.internal.jbossatx.jta that implement XAResourceRecoveryHelper 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XAResourceRecoveryHelperWrapper
      Simple adaptor class that converts the JBossAS transaction integration SPI version of the recovery interface (org.jboss.tm.XAResourceRecovery) into the ArjunaJTA version (com.arjuna.ats.jta.recovery.XAResourceRecoveryHelper) so it can then be registered with the Recovery system (XARecoveryModule)

    • Uses of XAResourceRecoveryHelper in com.arjuna.ats.internal.jta.recovery.arjunacore

      Methods in com.arjuna.ats.internal.jta.recovery.arjunacore with parameters of type XAResourceRecoveryHelper 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void XARecoveryModule.addXAResourceRecoveryHelper(XAResourceRecoveryHelper xaResourceRecoveryHelper) 
      void XARecoveryModule.removeXAResourceRecoveryHelper(XAResourceRecoveryHelper xaResourceRecoveryHelper) 

    • Uses of XAResourceRecoveryHelper in org.jboss.narayana.jta.jms
